_doc: Platforms demoted from picker pool. Picker skips these IDs. Add entries when E sessions repeatedly fail to engage a platform despite liveness probes showing it as reachable.

demotions.reason: Unreachable for 3+ consecutive E sessions (s1251, s1453, s1465) despite passing liveness probes
